pages.text: It is truly remarkable! I have found a mysterious $(thing)spore$() which seems to enveloped a bundle of seeds. It gives off the most $(o)peculiar$() glimmer. What could these be used for?

pages.title: Glimmering Spores
pages.text: I must $(key)plant$() these as soon as I can. These might grow well in $(key)places mushrooms can sprout$()...
